attributes.title: worst app i’ve ever seen
attributes.review: when i got this app i had very high hopes, but they were soon dashed. the first thing i saw when i opened the app was an invitation to a pagan ritual where we drink childrens’ blood and dance around a fire(it was an ad paid for by his administration). usually i would have no problem with pop ups like these, but the font was so tacky i could barely look at it without feeling sick. the app just got worse from there. i don’t know what to tell you, other than please don’t purchase this.

attributes.title: Disgustin🤮
attributes.review: This app is horrible when I first opened the app there was a big fat Cheeto rat 🐀🤢. Soon afterwards that was all I could see, big fat Cheeto rats. This really traumatized me and I had to go to a mental hospital😔. I can still hear the Karens yelling 🗣and the scurrying of the fat Cheeto rat. I do not recommend this app unless you want crippling depression and trauma.

attributes.title: Zero stars
attributes.review: If it were possible I would give this app zero stars. First off when I opened the app it would NOT let me do anything like the whole thing was frozen. I tried OVER AND OVER to get it to get it to work but nothing did! This is just a horrible HORRIBLE app do NOT download it!!!!

Believe me, you do not want to mess with Gen Z. TikTok is the only point of our existence, without it we will become a force worse than you could imagine; ruining your app and rally are just us warming up. You really don’t want to mess with such a huge part of the population. Oh and the app’s bad.🥰😌😙🧚‍♀️🧚🧚‍♂️

attributes.title: ❌❌❌Very terrible❌❌❌
attributes.review: I gave this app a 1/5 stars, I was just scrolling through, looking for games to play and this one had a Cheeto on the front cover and stars so I thought it would be like super Mario. IT WAS A SCAMMMMM this VERY ugly man popped up when I opened the app and it frightened me so much that I went into an oblivion shock for 23 DAYS! DO NOT RECOMMEND!!!😰❌❌❌

attributes.title: Absolutely disgusting
attributes.review: Right as a first open the app I see a naked picture of Donald Trump. The PP on this man was so small it scared me so much. It gave me trauma and as my children also downloaded the app it gives them trauma. It was absolutely disgusting and disturbing! I give this app a one star review for how much Donald Trump a little Shrimp scared me children.

attributes.title: 😓this app is bad true story 👁👄👁
attributes.review: I was minding my own business scrolling through the App Store and all of a sudden “BOOM” this app was downloaded. And it starting hunting my house and one day “BOOM” I see a a tiger 🐅 in the morning and I was scared 😓 so then the next day “BOOM” I see a zoo please don’t get this app thank u for ur time 🧚🏽‍♀️✨ o and this app gets u blind 👁👄👁

attributes.title: iM sorry I have smelly potato’s ok?✨💅😻
attributes.review: I love gen z these reviews are hilarious😹😹😹this is a very disrespectful app because my Cheetos were left in the oven👁👅👁💅✨ AND THEY TOLd ME TO MAKe NEW ONES. Like, nO, burnt and crusty😻or nothing at all I ain’t making new Cheetos because pizza roles are better.😌💅 but this ugly cheese stick said that Cheetos have eyes and I ate eyes then😹😻ty for having me today, goodbye👁👄👁👋

attributes.title: This is horrifying
attributes.review: I open up the app and I see a Cheeto man standing in front of our flag! My son shreaked and came rushing upstairs crying as if he just saw a ghost! And when I go back to the home screen there was a naked orange! I couldn’t believe my eyes! I gasped in shock and had to delete this app I do not recommend to any ages! :(

attributes.title: 🤢🤢🤢 Gross! Slow!
attributes.review: I downloaded the app with high hopes! Amurricaaa! only to have the horrid sight of the walking spray tan malfunction appear.... I screamed, threw my phone, and now she’s broken! The app is a glitchy mess </3  Sends me notifs like 500 times a day. It slowed my phone down, the app ran terrible too. 0/10 would not recommend.
attributes.userName: 🙉🙈 Oh to see without my eyes
